item.title: Announcer Timer Spams? Doesn't even time
item.dc:creator: @Kedonot11 Kedonot11
item.description:
@Kedonot11 wrote:

I used this tutorial…

To add a timer that goes off every so often, simply open client and add this at the top.

Code (Java): [Select]
public static int annoTimer = 500;
You can change the 500 to anything you want, but that’s a good wait time between announcements.

After adding that find

Code (Java): [Select]
public boolean process() {
Above that add

Code (Java): [Select]
if(annoTimer > 0) {
annoTimer --;
}
if(annoTimer < 0) {
annoTimer += 500;
}
and under it add

Code (Java): [Select]
if(annoTimer == 0) {
sM(“Message.”);
}

Okay. Well… I did that. But the sM message spams, like a lot…
I’m not sure what im doing wrong… So i made the 0’s 500’s and still not working…
Hmm?

Read full topic
item.source: Announcer Timer Spams? Doesn't even time
